title: Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information !!!
body: This error occurred earlier this morning when I was trying to update a game to _patch 6.10_... Please help me or give me a **solution** to this problem anybody, thank you!

replies.body:
Getting an Unspecified Error message when attempting to patch usually points to a type of connection issue.  The patcher needs to connect to our Patcher Servers to download the latest content onto your computer.  If something blocks this connection from taking place, then the patcher throws up this error message.  Since the patcher has no idea why this connection was blocked or terminated, it says "unspecified".

In order to get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has the most common solutions that should prevent this error from popping up and let you patch normally.
Having the same problem, considering a full uninstall/reinstall.

> [{quoted}](name=Mylon Requiem,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=50REJFEY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-18T16:01:10.414+0000)
>
> Having the same problem, considering a full uninstall/reinstall.

as i was typing to let me know results, i restarted computer and now it is working, one of the things it says to try is restart to refresh your internet the tcp/ip deal so i'd say give it a shot friend. and good luck :) -sidenote still had to scan over 4000 files at least i didn't hit 9k ex dee.

What could i do?
Connection problem?

Unspecified Error Message: check logs... 000000.120|  ERROR| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::GetUnexpectedRunningProcessesString: Unexpected running processes: D:/League/RADS/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.93/deploy/LoLPatcherUx.exe 

Did full uninstall and now this message pops up as soon as luancher pops up. anyone?

I have the same problem,

I update and round 33-39 it gives the error.
I've been tot  Connection Issues Article. I did everything that was possible.
I wanted to try on an other way if my conecction was working with LoL so I download it on an other PC and it worked.
So anyone have a solution for this?
(P.S. I'm not that good with PC)
Currently having this problem, have tried everything. Pretty much at the end of my tether. Suggestions?

The same thing happened to me. Tried to do all the other solutions from past patches, but nothing fixed the error. The only thing for me left to do is to run League as administrator.. So that's what I'm trying to do now.
Running the game as administrator worked! - The error was fixed
